thumb.name: Happy Beginnings
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy New Year%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope this is%3Cbr%3Ethe happy beginning%3Cbr%3Eof your most%3Cbr%3Ewonderful year yet!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Wish for Peace Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELet peace fill%3Cbr%3Eour hearts%3Cbr%3Eand our homes%3Cbr%3Euntil it encircles%3Cbr%3Eour world.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing peace and happiness%3Cbr%3Efor you and those you love%3Cbr%3Ethrough all the days of the new year.%3Cbr%3E
